title: Temel: Sümela'nın Şifresi Yeniden
overview: Temel, who wants to win Fadime's father's favor, makes a "hamsirone" to support Trabzonspor. However, while he thinks that this will lead to something good, an unfortunate accident causes the "hamsirone" to hit the Trabzonspor bus and things get complicated. While Temel tries to fix the situation with his partner Dursun, he finds himself in the middle of tragicomic events.
